Key Match Events: Jackson Irvine scored the first goal in the 50th minute.
Jordan Bos scored the second goal in the 73rd minute.
Pre-Game Insights: India displayed remarkable grit and determination in the first half to keep Australia at bay.
Australian captain Mathew Ryan and Indian captain Sunil Chhetri shook hands with Japanese referee Ms. Yamashita Yoshimi.
Indian coach Igor Stimac kept an eagle-eyed watch on his wards.
Post-Match Reflections: Australian players celebrated with relief, indicating they did not expect India to hold on for so long.
Indian fans felt proud and encouraged by the performance of the Blue Tigers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India had a chance in the 15th minute but Sunil Chhetri missed a heading opportunity.
Sandesh Jhingan played with a bandage on his forehead.
The match was extended by at least six minutes of added time.
